value.labelNoun: This pawn has received a boost from eating a prothean meal.
This pawn's moving speed is hindered as long as it's in Prothean Slowness Beacon's range.
This pawn's defense is hindered as long as it's in Prothean Fragility Beacon's range.
This pawn's sight is hindered as long as it's in Prothean Blindness Beacon's range.

value.description: A wall created by a prothean. Has self-repairing capabilities, practically indestructible.
A wall created by a prothean. Unlike its normal counterpart it doesn't have self-repairing capabilities, it's still very durable though.
A wall created by a prothean. Indestructible.
An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof. Inserting a prothean fragment into it made it slightly better than a normal wall.
A heating device created by a prothean. It slowly and passively heats up the area.
A cooling device created by a prothean. It slowly and passively cools down the area.
This prothean device can light up a large area without requiring any power of fuel.
A strange prothean device capable of instantly summoning mechanoids with just a press of a "button".
a prothean device capable of instantly summoning a meteorite, unfortunately it's inpossible to tell where exactly will it land.
a prothean device capable of taming a random nearby animal or summoning a wanderer to join your colony, there's a small chance of summoning a raid or a manhunter pack instead.
A prothean fragment on a stick, that's it. A decent light source if your colonists are too feeble-minded to use the fragments for anything else.
A strange block of meat created by a prothean device. When eaten it changes its form to match the texture and taste of the consumer's favourite type of meat. It also glows for some reason.

A strange block of plant matter created by a prothean device. When eaten it changes its form to match the texture and taste of the consumer's favourite type of vegetable or fruit. It also glows for some reason.
A special meal prepared with prothean ingredients. Delicious and healthy.

A strange block of what appears to be a mix of milk and egg created by a prothean device. When eaten it changes its form to match the texture and taste of the consumer's favourite type of animal product. It also glows for some reason.
Animal feed made by an archotech device. While humanlikes are perfectly capable of eating it with no consequences, it is very inefficient.
This strange prothean device increases movement speed of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases learning speed of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases armor of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases healing speed and medical capabilities of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases combat capabilities of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases mining and drilling speed of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases plant work speed and yield of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases cooking speed and lower the chance of food poisoning of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases charisma of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases animal tame and train chance of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases temperature tolerance of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases building speed of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases work speed of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device decreases movement speed of any nearby enemy.
This strange prothean device decreases defense of any nearby enemy.
This strange prothean device decreases sight of any nearby enemy.
This strange prothean device increases psychic sensitivity of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device decreases psychic sensitivity of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases carrying capacity of anyone nearby.
This strange prothean device increases increases meat and leather yield of any creature nearby.
This strange prothean device decreases pain tolerance of any nearby enemy.
This strange prothean device increases pain tolerance of any nearby enemy.
A speed boost added by the prothean hermes beacon.
A skill learning boost added by the prothean knowledge beacon.
An armor boost added by the prothean protection beacon.
A wound regeneration speed boost added by the prothean health beacon.
A mining speed boost added by the prothean mining beacon.
A plant work speed boost added by the prothean planting beacon.
A plant work speed boost added by the prothean planting beacon.
A social boost added by a prothean beacon.
A combat boost added by a prothean beacon.
A taming/training boost added by a prothean beacon.
A temperature resistance boost added by a prothean beacon.
A building speed boost added by a prothean beacon.
After eating a prothean meal this pawn received a boost of energy!.
A work speed boost added by the prothean motivation beacon.
This pawn is currently in a stasis, they will not bleed or take any damage
A speed reduction added by the prothean slowness beacon.
A defense reduction added by the prothean fragility beacon.
A sight reduction added by the prothean blindness beacon.
A psychic sensitivity boost added by a prothean beacon.
A psychic sensitivity reduction added by a prothean beacon.
A carry capacity boost added by an prothean beacon.
A butchering yield boost added by a prothean beacon.
A pain tolerance reduction added by a prothean beacon.
A pain tolerance boost added by a prothean beacon.
A strange prothean device. It can be used to revive any pawn without any consequences, even works on rotting corpses. Just...watch out for any time anomalies.
A healing kit created by a prothean. Can alternatively be used like a healer mech serum.
All prothean buildings should show up here once the research requirements are met.
Produces one of each prothean body parts every 10 days. It requires no power of fuel to function.

A workbench equipped with the tools necessary for work on prothean devices. The bench seems to have a mind of its own, any person using it seems to enter a trance-like state for the duration of the task and is only able to recall a fraction of the experience.
This strange prothean device periodically summons a drop pod that may contain either items or in some cases, people. Nobody knows where the pods appear from

A device designed to make it easier for an AI to help you uncover the secrets of the protheans (or at least some of them). It will generate research points to a random project every day, but due to the fact protheans don't like sharing knowledge without being asked first, the effects may vary. On rare occasions it might also move progress backwards (but keep in mind that it's impossible for it to "unresearch" a project). Deconstruction or destruction will cause it to activate a strong psychic droner.

A prothean device capable of creating prothean fragments and prothean mass. Possibly a piece of a self-building device, but with no instructions to follow it leaves the produced materials on the ground.\n\nCan be placed on tables

A prothean device capable of creating prothean fragments and prothean mass. Possibly a piece of a self-building device, but with no instructions to follow it leaves the produced materials on the ground.

A prothean device capable of creating prothean fragments and prothean mass. Possibly a piece of a self-building device, but with no instructions to follow it leaves the produced materials on the ground.

A prothean device capable of creating prothean fragments and prothean mass. Possibly a piece of a self-building device, but with no instructions to follow it leaves the produced materials on the ground.
A prothean device that seems to assist in cooking. It also generates strange, yet tasty and nutricious "food" on regular intervals.
A strange prothean device that adds around 100 points to a random research project every 24 hours, more or less.
Disassemble a dead mechanoid for its basic components and prothean fragments. This procedure requires a good amount of precision, therefore it requires more time and skill to complete than shredding.
Cook a prothean meal.
Make prothean plant matter by compressing vegetables or fruits. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".
Make prothean plant matter by compressing meat. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".
Make prothean plant matter by compressing different animal products. Over half of the ingredients are "wasted".
Makes prothean power cell.
Makes prothean resurrector.
Makes prothean eye.
Makes prothean arm.
Makes prothean leg.
Makes prothean medicine.
Converts prothean fragments into prothean mass, this is a very inefficient process.
Converts prothean mass into prothean fragments, this is a very inefficient process.
A prothean fragment. A strange glowing piece of material, not usable in many things in its current form. It may be possible to manipulate and form it into useful items with enough research.
A strange prothean substance. It has the ability to reshape itself into any kind of material. Lightweight, durable and beautiful
A prothean floor tile. Very clean and sturdy.
A prothean floor tile. Very clean and sturdy. Now with 50% less eye-melting patterns.

It seems that burying prothean fragments can turn any terrain into decently fertile soil, even if said terrain is literally a pile of rocks. This was discovered when a salarian researcher tried to hide prothean fragments he once found by burying them in sand from his superiors, only to be found out when the patch turned fertile.
A prothean floor tile. Very clean and sturdy. Despite its weight it seems to effortlessly float on water.
A prothean floor tile. Very clean and sturdy. Despite its weight it seems to effortlessly float on water. Now with 50% less eye-melting patterns.
